== Notes ==
{{notelist}}

; Other notes
* From Beta 1.9 Prerelease to 14w08a, unconnected fence posts would contain two small cuboids, completely interior to the fence block. These could only be seen by clipping inside of the fencepost itself. This did not change the outwards appearance of unconnected fences.
* The following reported issues may change the appearance of fences in future if fixed:
** {{bug|MC-109478}} - Fence model texture doesn't connect correctly
** {{bug|MC-267281}} - Fence multipart model system performance optimization
